name: GUINXUJAM2017
description:
Juego finalista en el GuinxuJAM 2017. Un creador de contenido para youtube y desarrollador de videojuegos descubre que le han robado su personaje para desarrollar shovelware y vender sus juegos. El se molesta y a decidido tomar la justicia en sus manos.

Finalist in GuinxuJAM 2017. A youtuber an indie game developer find out that a character of his own has been stolen. Justice with be made, be his own hand's or in this case... with his code!!!

/////Control\\\\\

Todas, pero sobre todo el raton, flechas, barra y alt.

All keyboard, mouse

NOTE: This game it's in spanish, sorry for the troubles but it's really short and you really don't need it. Have a nice day.
